name: Bombing Man
description:
Hey, HELP!

It's an emergency, the man is on fire, you need to cut the ropes or blocks to let him drop into the water before bombing!

Think it over and find the best solution for each puzzle. Thank you first and now, get moving!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
